column2: "After saying what I did, I can't believe you still came."
"But that's not for me to say, since we share the same fate. Let's do our best."
"For this investigation, our objective is to find out what Luther is doing on this planet."
"It seems likely there's still some equipment in the facility in the back of this area."
"We need to examine the area while any evidence may be left intact."
"第4章 霞の先で掴むもの"
